part.Short: Wet nostrils flare at the seat of =pronouns.possessive= dropped snout, and furry arms wave in unpredicted motions. =pronouns.Possessive= eyes are full of stony mischief.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Oiled and brushed mail hang across =pronouns.possessive= crooked spine and salient jaw. The color too was sucked out of =pronouns.possessive= irises by =pronouns.possessive= tangled lineage, and =pronouns.possessive= wet rosy lips catch the light and toss it back across a sharp sneer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.IndicativeProximal= brawny, mustachioed =pronouns.personTerm= =verb:wear:afterpronoun= a white apron stained with the juice of starapples. =pronouns.Possessive= sable hair mats against the browned skin of =pronouns.possessive= forehead. From =pronouns.possessive= left forearm hangs a wet rag, with which =pronouns.subjective= =verb:scrub:afterpronoun= the dirt from =pronouns.possessive= hands every few moments.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: O, she doth pale red apples by her cheek! That cheek which doth proclaim the rite of spring, And heretofore hath nature's grand technique, Ne'er ripened lips so red from which to sing. Begone, false sun! I know thee for a fraud. Her fairest skin illuminates the day. All gold is brass and e'ery jewel is flawed, When set beside the sums her eyes might pay. The Spindle, which from Omonporch ascends, Must surely be her likeness brightly wrought, And as a likeness, fails to apprehend, The artless beauty that its makers sought. Did I know love or beauty? No, for shame! For I knew neither 'til they spoke her name.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It sheaths itself in filmy wings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: "The Grizzly Bear is huge and wild; =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:have:afterpronoun= devoured the infant child. The infant child is unaware =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:have:afterpronoun= been eaten by the bear." -A.E. Housman

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It made for a grisly meal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dirt-dappled flesh hangs from =pronouns.possessive= pouch belly and nearly slaps =pronouns.possessive= chipper trotters.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is tough but the meal is filling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Next to =pronouns.possessive= pig cousins, wild time has shorted =pronouns.possessive= ears, pushed canines through =pronouns.possessive= jaw, and dressed =pronouns.objective= in a scratch-hair coat. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:root:afterpronoun= in the ground for jewels.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is tough but the meal is filling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sunshame has left =pronouns.possessive= skin pulpy and spider-white, and =pronouns.possessive= capillaries are shot with blood two shades too dark.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= Spindle-limbed and skittish. Bits of =pronouns.possessive= silk home are stuck to =pronouns.possessive= underhairs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= a small kitty and the glassy fibers of =pronouns.possessive= coat bend the light of faraway stars into strange loops.
&mphosphorescent&y

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= hoary, cracked scales look like marked stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lean and sticky rib meat was torn off the scale-sheathed bone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= a snarling mess of matted hair.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thatched together out of scrap metal, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:teeter:afterpronoun=. What was the artist and maker thinking while banging metal into a likeness? =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:occupy:afterpronoun= a point between poles on several axes: halfway between chimp and human, halfway between child and adult. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= small, and there are shadows under =pronouns.possessive= chrome cheek.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gossamer hairs stand stiff in static charge across =pronouns.possessive= octet of Spindle legs, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:crackle:afterpronoun= as =pronouns.subjective= =verb:crawl:afterpronoun=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gossamer hairs splay at straight angles from its crumpled legs-things.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slime within the quivering blob striates into different densities. You can barely perceive the outline of something inside.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shining black elytra flitter on the back of a goat-sized bug.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chittering legs in the high dozens figure S-swerve =pronouns.possessive= shining trunk like the spine of a gigantic hominid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Big diaphanous wings bat the air as =pronouns.subjective= =verb:drone:afterpronoun= in place.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lucent skin blooms beneath matted feathers. =pronouns.Possessive= tiny beak is hooked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Luminescent flecks flit beneath the water's surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dimmed motes dot the scales.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A leaf disc gleams through luminous veins.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= curling horns are incised with the weathering script of time, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:chew:afterpronoun= cud without a care for the mess in =pronouns.possessive= hairknot beard.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's raw with blood and gamey.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Minuscule skin crystals shift and sort light to pattern match whatever is outside the body boundary. A narrow bone extrudes from =pronouns.possessive= head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long lathe of time shaved the prospects from beneath a reptile's feet until =pronouns.subjective= hid in a shell of plastron and carapace, brooding and peevish.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Verdurous cirri mottled with thorns reach for the warmth of a body. They hug the air in desperation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The pig farmer slouches in the heat. A beaten, leather hat is pulled low over =pronouns.possessive= eyes and sweat glistens on the scruffs of hair on =pronouns.possessive= cheeks. =pronouns.Possessive= hands are caked in mud and salt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bulbous snags of plant are clustered in sundry sizes. Spines poke through the dusty spider matting that dresses them.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Matted fronds sway in the air currents and speckle the ground with flakes of moisture-sucked rust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ovoid spots, crimson and coral and citrine, scatter like an island chain across =pronouns.possessive= back and neck.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Motes of salt hang still on the notches of =pronouns.possessive= chitin and in the air above it. Behind, =pronouns.possessive= stinger coils in harmonic virtue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The patchwork of burnt metal and rust-flaked rivets make a gradient of newflesh across the hermit's body. =pronouns.Possessive= hair is knotted into a rat's nest and held high by a barrette of broken glass. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:scream:afterpronoun= in a tongue of =pronouns.possessive= own invention.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Jade green tendrils curl inward and hug =pronouns.possessive= center in tension. =pronouns.Possessive= leaves vibrate to low-volume crunches as =pronouns.subjective= =verb:compact:afterpronoun= seed matter for spitting.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Compacted seed matter that's been stuffed into the leaf-mitt of a coiled tendril.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The tatters of a sweat-stained kufiya thrash in the wind from where they hang about the farmer's neck. Clasped in =pronouns.possessive= gnarled, brown hand is a curved vinereaper of iron with which =pronouns.subjective= =verb:cull:afterpronoun= moisture-swollen wafers from the viridian plant called watervine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Packed into rents in the shale are spinescent shoots of blooming ivory.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tussocks of fur dress skin stretched over taut muscle. Upright =pronouns.subjective= =verb:stand:afterpronoun=, but =pronouns.subjective= =verb:look:afterpronoun= ready to drop onto fours. =pronouns.Possessive= snout snarls and =pronouns.possessive= ears twitch. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:bark:afterpronoun=, and =pronouns.possessive= hyena tribeskin answer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mottled leaf-chutes are splayed out in a rosette. Dust appears and disappears in swirls.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bonnet blue wings contour to =pronouns.possessive= abdominal balloon, puffed out to blimpish volume by the garbage =pronouns.subjective= =verb:have:afterpronoun= eaten.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Reticle dots are stretched to curved geometry on =pronouns.possessive= bright and turgid wormback. =pronouns.Possessive= sucker bells flap open, satisfied.

part.Short: Shining black elytra flitter on the back of a goat-sized bug.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of spitdrool snouts snap at each other's hairy ear. =pronouns.Possessive= hocks are widened to bear more weight than =pronouns.possessive= one-headed cousins, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:squeal:afterpronoun= with the choler of a twice-hungry animal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The mess was combed out of =pronouns.possessive= nape by a doting companion, and =pronouns.possessive= forelegs are stiff in vigil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ageless little eyes on stalks stick out of an elfin shell whose geometry conforms curiously to the shape of chutes and vents, Eater-wrought and after.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shadow inches over the dull white carapace of a giant and caveborn crustacean. =pronouns.Possessive= eyestalks have shrunk to nothing in the sundim grottos of the underearth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wide-sheet petals span above a snapjaw's height and thrice as wide. =pronouns.Possessive= stamen looks like a bundle of saltback tongues, and =pronouns.possessive= scent is describable as 'sweaty animal'. Several thorn-touched rhizome pods fidget near =pronouns.possessive= stem like a clutch of eager children.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shoot-foot rhizome pod jitters on the dirt and sheds its brittle out-material. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:seek:afterpronoun= a hot vessel to deliver =pronouns.possessive= explosive gift.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plies of nest-skin swell and contract as if the thing were taking breaths. Its darkling cavities glint with larvae burning to be born.

part.Name: Nest
part.SpawnMessage: A giant centipede crawls out of the nest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rain of gorgeous dust drifts down a frustum of light, and radiant mirrorwings bat it through the air vacuum.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It decays and gives off a warm and lovely heat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The patchwork of ash and dirt-caked hides make a gradient of flesh across the hermit's body. =pronouns.Possessive= hair has knotted into a rat's nest. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:scream:afterpronoun= in a tongue of =pronouns.possessive= own invention.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Everything near the bantam mammal is damp: fur, hair, leaves, soil, slick silver alloys. =pronouns.Subjective==verb:'re:afterpronoun= become a furry world unto =pronouns.reflexive=, and the sweet and sickening honey-mist about =pronouns.objective= is the atmosphere.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thick cord of bristly segments are capped by a cuspate beak for breaking through shale.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rings of still, spongy wormbody are mixed with crushed beak, and little bristles scrape the earth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Reticle dots lattice =pronouns.possessive= gooey wormback, and sucker bells pinch the air with blooditch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The pilgrim wears a costume of humility: simple frock, wide-brimmed hat, cerulean scarf, slouched back, and weary eyes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The pilgrim wears a costume of humility: simple frock, wide-brimmed hat, cerulean scarf, slouched back, and weary eyes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= hunch-back is meadowed in tattered robes the color of slate. Strands of matted chin hair splay against =pronouns.possessive= chapped lips, and =pronouns.possessive= eyes dart at nearish trinkets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A powdery kittel curtains =pronouns.possessive= thin shoulders, whose relative bulk along with the keenness of =pronouns.possessive= eye marks =pronouns.objective= as attentive to this timeplace, and so lower rank than =pronouns.possessive= seeker-kith.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= secreted worm resin that hardened under the pressure of shale into armored plates. Inside, a thick cord of bristly segments are capped by a cuspate break for breaking through rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bulge-eye head and stretched thorax of sunsalt white is poised to leap through the air by the trust of a sestet of bounding legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Leaves swaddle its hundred segments and lashed root matter squirms out of its tail end.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glistening barrels of silvery wormstuff shudder and tear in two, pause, and then excrete the process over again.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= hull is time-decked in verdigris. Rotator armlikes driven by gears are endcapped instead of hands by a shovel and hacksaw.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scratch-hair mats on an elongated snout and her nostrils drip scood, the liquified sinew of scavenged corpses, before it can dry and compact into snoutshot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cyclinder with a sensor array floats in magnetic suspension and emits a choppy hum. One long, articulated arm dangles beneath it, and sparks fly from its electric corm.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Life's blossoming ringlets were freed from their orb-womb of carbon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wet skin scintillates behind =pronouns.possessive= ears. =pronouns.Possessive= spine cambers in anticipation of its blood-fated curvature, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:poke:afterpronoun= out =pronouns.possessive= chin in emulation of =pronouns.possessive= elders. Sword grease stains =pronouns.possessive= hands.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Triangular leaves pant in the salt-sucked air, and the flowerhead angles its sharp thistles to thirsty attention.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Springy skin is contracted into a taut globule notched with abeyant thistles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rust-flaked trash from a cross-section of eons functions as =pronouns.possessive= habit, contoured to =pronouns.possessive= body by a lifetime of wear.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wormflesh drags apart into another self. In sunken and lightless grottos of stippled earth, the honeycomb to fossil people, a machine whir overlays the slump of the mantle and activates the primal biology of trash maggots everywhere.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Star orchid saliva pools at the tips of =pronouns.possessive= fangs and drips onto pallid leg-things. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:shudder:afterpronoun= in the capture of some pristine ecstasy lost to space and time, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:let:afterpronoun= out a proud and piercing whine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pallid leg-things twitch with zoetic insistence, and a pair of fangs poke at nothing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Star orchid saliva pools in the cavities where =pronouns.possessive= fangs used to be and drips onto pallid leg-things. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:shudder:afterpronoun= in the capture of some pristine ecstasy lost to space and time, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:let:afterpronoun= out a proud and piercing whine.

The human gatherer who mounts a root-braided hillock and looks out to the horizon in wonder, who descries flecks of granite stirring on the mountain face, and who with ancestral dread ponders what toll the rocks themselves are animated to collect, he can't know the miracles of chemistry that sophists inscribed in data disks at the Long Before. Those miracles are to him the ciphers of god-things.

The irises of =pronouns.possessive= eyes are patterned on shapes that cannot be drawn in the geometries of the natural world. =pronouns.Possessive= weapon is immaterial but inseparable; it was spun from the same thoughtstuff as =pronouns.possessive= ego.

Under the right conditions, at time scales inscrutable to kith and kin, the bits are heaped together by the geometry of entropy and remorphed into the prime material anew.

Under the right conditions, at time scales inscrutable to kith and kin, the bits are heaped together by the geometry of entropy and remorphed into the prime material anew.

But when she's joined by her sisters, and scarlet ribbons thrash in the desert air, there is only blood and justice.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Asphodel (called the Lovely) =subject.verb:turn= =pronouns.possessive= tipping anthers at seductive angles. All the bright golds of the harvest sun and musa peel are garnishes to the frail beauty of =pronouns.possessive= petal. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:claim:afterpronoun= the aesthetic lineage of Hegelrut, and from that argument flowers =pronouns.possessive= claim to Omonporch and the entire Great Shade of the grove.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Flower buds cluster in sixes across =pronouns.possessive= time-maimed topaz bark and are ringed by glossy green leaves. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:shoot:afterpronoun= up tall in defiance of millenia of wall shade, but =pronouns.possessive= crown sags with weary softness, and =pronouns.possessive= exposed roots trace the outline of a grassy salon. The grove's oldest tree, called the Haddas, welcomes you to =pronouns.possessive= shadow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stuck to =pronouns.possessive= rind of mirrored chrome sequins are two separate ecologies: the crispy deadgrowths of the inner Tomb and the verdurous molt of grove life. As the years spin by and the colossus adjusts to the sun-drenched outer world, the latter consumes the former.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sharp leaves burst forth from a decorative pot like a geyser of verdure. They flit as with irritation and offense at every stimulus, an assumption that might seem like an overread if it weren't for the strong telepathic halo of frustration radiating from =pronouns.possessive= leafy form.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A man in the threadbare clothes of a tattered knight stands as if hewn from the trunk of a tree. Gnarled hands grip with more force than is needed for the task of standing at an unasked vigil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spools of hair are bunched under the frustum of =pronouns.possessive= habit, =pronouns.possessive= round cheeks are smeared with polyurethane and Spindle dust, and =pronouns.possessive= face is pulled low by the violence of =pronouns.possessive= square jaw. Long, muscular forearms are tensed by the repeated pinching motion of tool manipulation. =pronouns.Possessive= eyes are ultra keen and shine bright cyan, and =pronouns.possessive= vision smoothly segues between =pronouns.possessive= work and =pronouns.possessive= surroundings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
Is it a coincidence that the knotted, erumpent throng of organ that is Pax Klanq is shaped in the vague form of a humanoid, or is the prodigy fungus welcoming =pronouns.possessive= extradimensional anthropoid visitors with a warm gesture? In either case, =pronouns.possessive= splendid orange cap looks like a fancy hat. The semblance ends there, however; in place of a face, there's only a trio of undulating tentacles.
At the edges of your field of vision, more tentacles writhe over tools, books, circuitboards, frog cadavers, and saltwater pearls. You realize just how many things Klanq does at once, and you wonder at Nature's decision to bestow peak organic wit to a fungus.

tag.Name: CustomDeathMessage
tag.Value: {{W|=subject.T= =verb:dissipate= into a cloud of reproductive spores.}}

part.Name: QuestStepFinisher
part.Step: Seek the Heart of the Rainbow~Eat the God's Flesh~Follow the Coral Path

part.Name: SecretObjectTalk
part.message: You now know the location of {{M|Hamilcrab's shop}}.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Geometry is stressed under the gelatin alp, which erupts from the smooth planes of its surroundings in disgusting triumph of size. Its k membranous faces, once taut by the pressurization of symmetry, now follow a sagging curve toward the wet core, and through the blurry placentae shines a museum of historical objects from across the numbered ages. Are those the bones of a pig? Is that a bronze bell? Inside the bright-slick sac, earth-remnants from across time are joined to one space, and k-Goninon sloshes in hunger.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome bunches in cloth-like furrows across a metal tunic that drapes across =pronouns.possessive= lanky, anxious, pinion-limbs. A large metal cask -- =pronouns.possessive= head -- sits atop =pronouns.possessive= too-frail undercarriage, and a gleaming glass eye shines at you in several shades of tinted light. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:seem:afterpronoun= on the verge of apologizing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Three digitigrade skinshine legs are weighed down by the aura of a floating metal carapace, suspended across three bands in quantum magnetic tension. Prehensile braids of cordage spill from =pronouns.possessive= apertures (ending in manic and electric eyes), and the air around =pronouns.objective= purrs in the audio multitexture of gold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Arches of burnished shell huddle together as a shy metal pill bug. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:inch:afterpronoun= along on brush-shaped appendages, and the only way to tell for sure which way =pronouns.subjective= =verb:face:afterpronoun= is the cross of light athwart =pronouns.possessive= front plate.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: There is no mouth here, and yet =pronouns.subjective= =verb:scream:afterpronoun=: a stringy and sharp whine too high-pitched for ears. Unalgebraic points of wickedness sheet =pronouns.possessive= entire serpent bod, and slit eyes spy a torturous path forward.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Piers of stillborn glass convey the walking thing forward with grace and dumb purpose. An astral spike of head backstabs the drift wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:squat:afterpronoun= in a soft halo of cool light that emanates directly from the plates of =pronouns.possessive= carapace armor and the fur between. Every movement is accompanied by sibilant music as those plates slide over one another, whispering a wordless prayer.
This one tugs on =pronouns.possessive= molly netting, ever checking on the security of its contents.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:squat:afterpronoun= in a soft halo of cool light that emanates directly from the plates of =pronouns.possessive= carapace armor and the fur between. Every movement is accompanied by sibilant music as those plates slide over one another, whispering a wordless prayer.
This one moves little and resembles a phosphorescent rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:squat:afterpronoun= in a soft halo of cool light that emanates directly from the plates of =pronouns.possessive= carapace armor and the fur between. Every movement is accompanied by sibilant music as those plates slide over one another, whispering a wordless prayer.
This one is traced by a long tail and wriggles in calm habit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
=pronouns.Subjective= =verb:squat:afterpronoun= in a soft halo of cool light that emanates directly from the plates of =pronouns.possessive= carapace armor and the fur between. Every movement is accompanied by sibilant music as those plates slide over one another, whispering a wordless prayer.
This one is jeweled in the eroded scrap of the Tomb.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Three steel barrels fit together into an arc-edged triangle of luminous ritualism. They sit on a servo-articulated base mount. Above, a pair of separately-articulated cameras swivel with somewhat more life than one might typically expect from an automated weapon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pouches of Tomb scrap and cookstuff are spread and hung from this mopango's carapace. =pronouns.Possessive= countenance is full of familial care and welcoming.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:glow:afterpronoun= softer than other mopango, bioluminescencing in pale and gentle hues that disguise =pronouns.objective= against the blanched walls of fossilized life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Damp clothes of the shomerim habit, a hoiche, a tallit, and a robe, drape over air as if they swathe a person's figure. Rain drops from another world patter on the bosks of ribboned thread, transforming from tense spheres of selfhood to diffuse moisture on the fibrous loam. Old life is absorbed by the ageless linen, wrung out by an invisible hand, and the cycle repeats itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Moist, patterned skin sloughs around a thousand bubble warts, and a horn-crown rounds =pronouns.possessive= enormous head thirteen span high. On =pronouns.possessive= malachine face, two fleece-like lids droop to couch ireful eyes of amber. A guttural boom in the contrabass spectrum drums out of =pronouns.possessive= vocal sac, vibrating the warty webbing on =pronouns.possessive= overgrown toes. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= a chiliad-chewed, mountainous wad of spite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warty skin and crooked bone were stretched out by an improbable row of centuries. The frog is now a looming, spine-skewed being. But =pronouns.possessive= visage peels into an affable grin and dissolves the menace of =pronouns.possessive= frame. A gigantic tongue flops out =pronouns.possessive= mouth now and again to bat something off =pronouns.possessive= steppeland back or muss the ground behind you.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The great frog's towering body is poised in peace and festooned like a skin temple. =pronouns.Possessive= shoulders drip with soft cloth and ornaments across the gamut of value; =pronouns.subjective= =verb:take:afterpronoun= no care to arrange or separate them.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skinny, spotted arms and legs flap in an unfolded position. =pronouns.Possessive= eyes bulge even further apart than other svardym, and in the center of his orbed head a warty ridge has thrusted up. The pupils of =pronouns.possessive= eyes are narrowed with spirited interest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= big web feet slosh over the ground to convey =pronouns.possessive= little frog self. Laced stripes of plastiglomerate form decorative rings through =pronouns.possessive= nostrils and around her eyelids.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: From a hydroponic planting tray dusted with decorative gravel, a column of sea grapes rises, twists, and bunches into the approximate shape of a woman. Though =pronouns.possessive= bubbly green strands are but a loose imitation of the flesh of limbs and digits, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:carry:afterpronoun= =pronouns.reflexive= with humanlike ease and =verb:manage:afterpronoun= to vocalize in a reedy but audible tone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= is a mudrock in the kaleidoscope. =pronouns.Possessive= salt-pocked skin, slouching spine, and dour expression are imported from the farmsteading reaches of western Qud, buh =pronouns.subjective= =verb:stand:afterpronoun= draped in the bright colors of =pronouns.possessive= brilliant eastborn flock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Draped in a heavy coat of scrap, wearing a beastly mask, and wielding a hand-cranked wheel-fiddle, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:look:afterpronoun= more the part of a pageantry player than a village's defender. Up close, however, you glimpse the hilt of =pronouns.possessive= brand, the butt of =pronouns.possessive= gun, and the burnished black aegis of unmarked fullerite that =pronouns.subjective= =verb:employ:afterpronoun=. Eyes of burnished azzurum peek through the sockets of =pronouns.possessive= beaked mask, suggesting the very threat =pronouns.possessive= costume was meant to annul.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: From a distance, the slynth could be mistaken for a human wearing a wide-brimmed, lanterned hat, but =pronouns.subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= no human and =pronouns.possessive= hat is no vestment. This one crooks with a small hunch earned from many hours of reading over many years. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:reel:afterpronoun= with the anxious air of a being waiting for something unknown.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mirrored ribbons in deep and bold colors run the manifold inside the crystal chime. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:ring:afterpronoun= in sonorous and commanding tones.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smooth crystal has been rent by trauma and left open in sharpened grief. Inside, billowing clouds of melancholy swell in gaseous tides.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Emotion and purpose are concentrated in sharp and bright points. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:ring:afterpronoun= and =verb:spin:afterpronoun= in defiance of the raw inertia at work in the psychic ether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Like malachine =pronouns.subjective= =verb:crust:afterpronoun= in the mammillary habit and =verb:glow:afterpronoun= with leafy warmth. =pronouns.Possessive= chimes are high and choral; =pronouns.subjective= =verb:harmonize:afterpronoun= with the dream wrens and wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hot ash and glitter radiate impossible colors in the arteries of the small chime, and dust swirls around =pronouns.possessive= psychomagnetic orbit. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:warble:afterpronoun= in the frequency of dreams.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A million etches across the parted leaf-chime speak the sense of touch. A sap-like substance drips off the crystal tip and attenuates =pronouns.possessive= vibrations to the bass range.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crystal sponge-chime shivers in acicular panic. Sharp tones ring off =pronouns.possessive= needle points and shatter in zeniths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stems lace and tangle on each other to effloresce as a vegetative body-maze. Where they swaddle the crystal trellis of Chavvah's branch, they burn with a pinkish tint. The leafy mass on the counterside of =pronouns.possessive= body jingles with white berries and a stock of rare goods.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smooth crystal glitters with soft light and renewed purpose across =pronouns.possessive= eight facets. Prism-limbs shatter out of =pronouns.possessive= torso and narrow each to a pentacle of sharp points, and a thrum beats at the air around the walking crystal being. The chime becomes.

part.Name: Titles
part.Primary: servant of Ptoh in the Cosmic Wood

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dimensional travels have altered the waifhood of this Sightless meyvn into something new. Where rattle-thin bones poke the skin of their lesser kin, a strange metallic fat obtains on =pronouns.possessive= starburnt flesh. Instead of the novice or disciple's splotchy baldness on the scalp, a strange fungus from the outer reaches grows as a new type of hair and peaks out the darkness of =pronouns.possessive= cowl. =pronouns.Possessive= blindfold remains, though it spins out in lateral ribbons and hangs with unearthly weight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bump, scars, and ridges crisscross the monstrous waveform shell from where the boundaries of dimensions ground against the interstitial space. A soft organ-thing lies inside, lit by the glimmers of Old Light flashing off the all-color nacre. Grooves across the shell mantle billow with the dust of ontoxanthellae, cross-dimensional symbiotes. Arrayed aside them are articles of other places, a pan-dimensional inventory stocked by an entropic broker.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A severe hindren =pronouns.personTerm= =verb:wear:afterpronoun= a spotless white tabard with long tails tailored to drape across =pronouns.possessive= longish back. Dappled flanks are arrayed in saddlebags heavy with esoteric gadgetry, and a bluish-white crust grows across =pronouns.possessive= face, rendering =pronouns.possessive= gimlet stare all the more striking.
